title: 求助 更改正版账户邮箱 出现错误
author: wuyuChina
txt_content:
提示 Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID. 该怎么办





image.png

下载附件


2020-8-2 11:50 上传

replies.author: Peanutz_OwO
replies.txt_content: 提示说让你联系 客服 以协助更改，可能之前有高危操作？

replies.author: S.Youk
replies.txt_content: 是火狐浏览器吗？如果是的话那就不应该啊？还是找客服吧

replies.author: MCEHY
replies.txt_content: 可以先看看浏览器，是否是浏览器的问题，然后可以去找一下客服

replies.author: wuyuChina
replies.txt_content:
34235253234 发表于 2020-8-2 16:52
可以去MOJANG官网申诉
好久之前买的 交易ID没有了
